column1: One year ago the people of ND honored me by electing me to become our state’s 24th US Senator. It has been a journey and the honor of a lifetime. I covet the prayers and counsel of the incredible people I get to represent and am grateful for their trust and God’s amazing grace. https://t.co/CY5qWDC3Bz
Gene Hanson is letting all who fly over North Dakota know our farmers support @realDonaldTrump for @POTUS in 2020 #KeepAmericaGreat #TrumpPence2020 https://t.co/avFUB3ThuS

Burgum-Sanford is a great team for a great state. Kris & I are honored to serve along side such remarkable leaders & commit ourselves to doing all we can for their re-election.  North Dakota is blessed by their service & deserves 4 more years. https://t.co/8jCV13v9FR via @YouTube

It’s interesting that after @POTUS @realDonaldTrump paid tribute to law enforcement in the Minneapolis rally liberals riot outside throwing things at the police. I can’t wait to hear the outrage from the media.
That was a great shoutout for you @LewisForMN ! You deserve it! https://t.co/U3JJ5K8ArE
Oh oh. The swamp gets busted again. https://t.co/l82s0GENAh
You nailed it Jason. @TheDemocrats would rather America fail than @POTUS @realDonaldTrump succeed. #SoSad https://t.co/SLnkiEsAyt
@kayleighmcenany @TeamTrump Honored to be on board and ready to serve.

Do I ever. You do a great job in the booth and I love watching on @foxsports. Long before politics I umpires a lot of Legion Baseball. The thick skin comes in handy. Keep up the good work. https://t.co/71ZOs7EGbg
@LaTroyHawkins32 should stop making excuses for Montgomery. He complained to the umpire for five innings while grooving HR pitches to the best bombers in MLB. #GoTwins
Congrats on making the run Jason! You are exactly the Republican who can win in Minnesota in 2020. A maxed out contribution from my Badlands PAC is on the way! https://t.co/yGDXfHjCm5

These Democrat candidates are running as far left as possible & out of the mainstream of middle America.   Their race to be named Most Radical stands in stark contrast with @realDonaldTrump’s record of results. #DemDebate #MAGA @EveningEdit https://t.co/OdOhne7KrG
Having served with @Jason2CD in the @NDHouseGOP I certainly hope he runs for the Senate. Jason is a solid conservative fighter and good friend. https://t.co/3XDhXmqmK3
I went to a pro-Israel meeting and a @realDonaldTrump rally broke out. https://t.co/8UJ4uGcWhc
These angels were in DC to celebrate their Papa’s swearing in. If they promote hotels as well as they promoted me you’ll need to add a phone line. https://t.co/VaJurTIeIF
We had great fellowship with Ken Hall of MHA Nation & Lt. Gen. Mick Kicklighter at a luncheon as part of the Governor’s Prayer Breakfast. #GodIsGood https://t.co/MlK4BG0UIx

As @realDonaldTrump said we must never let our country become a socialist nation.   This has to stop. We can't let Democrats successfully pull North Dakota toward this harmful liberal agenda. https://t.co/UCJjSGoP74
